e: ￹`Paka~`sopay~ `kiso~ `to~ `riko'~ `ako~?￺Can you rub the dirt out of my clothing?￻你能把我那件衣服的污垢除掉嗎？
￹`Ma~`sopay~ `ko~ `'oning~ `no~ `tireng~.￺My body has been rubbed clean.￻我身上的污垢已洗乾淨了
￹`Ma~`sopay~ `ko~ `faloco'~ `ako~.￺My bad attitude has gone.￻我已去邪歸正 (改過自新)
d.f: ￹￺to rub in order to remove dirt￻揉擦得以拭掉污物
